Summary I'm an experienced facilitating trainer and business acumen management consultant. I've been a corporate attorney and have a strong background in start-ups, securities, M&A, international transactions, joint ventures, and corporate governance. 
 
On the side I write fiction. Summary I'm an experienced facilitating trainer and business acumen management consultant. I've been a corporate attorney and have a strong background in start-ups, securities, M&A, international transactions, joint ventures, and corporate governance.

Experience Senior Consultant / Corporate Trainer Acumen Learning March 2013  – Present (2 years 6 months) Boise, Idaho Area I educate and inspire individuals and organizations by building their business acumen, accelerating their ability to accomplish great results. Attorney Law Offices of David J. Butler 2010  –  March 2013  (3 years) Eagle, Idaho Advised entrepreneurs, start-ups, and tech companies in Idaho and elsewhere with respect to strategic, corporate, commercial, and compliance issues. Director of Corporate Legal Numonyx 2008  –  2010  (2 years) Eagle, Idaho Managed in-house attorneys and outside counsel performing all corporate legal work of the high tech start-up Numonyx group. Reported to the General Counsel and managed an annual Corporate Legal budget of $1 million. 
 
Responsibilities included: strategic transactions, including the sale of company transaction (successfully closed in May 2010); establishment of the Numonyx presence in China and management of Numonyx’s minority stake in its Chinese manufacturing joint venture; legal review of procurement agreements; corporate governance and shareholder relationships; corporate secretarial and corporate housekeeping for all Numonyx group companies; a broad compliance mandate; policy setting; implementing compliance programs and company policy by training legal department staff, other functional groups, and C-level officers; and legal support for tax, treasury and finance departments. Senior Counsel Intel Corporation 2007  –  2008  (1 year) Eagle, Idaho Participated as Numonyx management in finalizing the spin-off transaction that created the Numonyx group. Associate General Counsel Micron Technology, Inc. 2005  –  2007  (2 years) Boise, Idaho Worked as a corporate generalist in the in-house legal department. Fulfilled responsibilities in the areas of corporate governance, compliance, public company reporting, shareholder relations, procurement agreement negotiation, joint venture negotiation and management, and general corporate work. Associate Clifford Chance LLP 1999  –  2005  (6 years) London, New York Worked as an associate in the cross-border capital markets practice of one of the world's largest law firms, in its London and New York offices.
